long_description: With roll-top protection from the elements, the SealLine Urban Backpack provides watertight performance for toting your stuff around town and on the trail. PVC-free construction includes burly 600-denier polyurethane coated polyester and a 400-denier thermoplastic urethane coated nylon bottom for extra protection. Ensure full weather protection with the roll-top closure, which secures with the QuickClip(TM) system that allows easy, 1-handed fastening and unfastening. Ergonomically shaped shoulder straps combine with a ventilated back panel, sternum strap and hideaway waistbelt for a comfortable, supportive fit. External front zip pocket stashes on-the-go essentials for easy access. Features SealLine Modular Accessory Pocket(TM) system for attaching handy add-ons, such as a Zip Pocket(TM) or Mobile Electronic Case(TM), all sold separately. The SealLine Urban Backpack is not intended to be submerged or provide absolute protection for electronics and sensitive items.
short_description: With roll-top protection from the elements, the SealLine Urban Backpack provides watertight performance for toting your stuff around town and on the trail.
